bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin zhen 癮疹 , dormant papules. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry da ji 大戟：醫 家用治隱疹風，及風毒脚腫，並煮水熱淋，日再三便愈 , “Medical experts use it to cure dormant papules wind , as well as wind poison with leg swelling. For both [these ailments] they boil water and pour it hot [on the affected area]. Repeated three times a day, this will bring the cure”.
